means: 使（某人或某物）恢复知觉，苏醒( resuscitate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The doctor resuscitated the man who was overcome by gas.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生救活了那个煤气中毒的人.

sentence.Network_en: She had been literally rejuvenated , resuscitated, brought back from the lip of the grave.
sentence.Network_cn: 她确确实实返老还童了, 恢复了精力, 被从坟墓的进口处拉了回来.

sentence.Network_en: The patient was successfully resuscitated and recovered without sequelae.
sentence.Network_cn: 病患成功地被急救及恢复而且没有任何后遗症.

list.abs: 脑复苏（Cerebral resuscitation）：在心肺复苏功能的早期即加强脑保护措施，以最大程度地恢复脑的功能；脑损伤的治疗措施 ?心 …
1. cardiopulmonary resuscitatorcardiopulmonary resuscitation　心肺复苏cardio-thoracic proportion 心胸比
manual reagent dispenser 手控试剂分注器manual resuscitator 人工复苏器manual sample changer 手控标本换样器
automatic respirator 自动呼吸器automatic resuscitator 自动复苏器automatic rinser 自动清洗机

entry.def: If you resuscitate someone who has stopped breathing, you cause them to start breathing again.

example.ex: A policeman and then a paramedic tried to resuscitate her.
example.tran: 一名警察和一位护理人员先后试图救活她。

entry.def: If you resuscitate something, you cause it to become active or successful again.

example.ex: He has submitted a bid to resuscitate the struggling magazine.
example.tran: 他已经投标来拯救这个岌岌可危的周刊。

auth_sentence.content: She had to be resuscitated by paramedics.
auth_sentence.res_content: She had to be resuscitated by paramedics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She had to be resuscitated by paramedics.

auth_sentence.content: The clientele seems largely to be from a resuscitated William Hickey column.
auth_sentence.res_content: The clientele seems largely to be from a resuscitated William Hickey column.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The clientele seems largely to be from a resuscitated William Hickey column.

auth_sentence.content: Just look at what happened in the month before Carlesimo resuscitated the team.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just look at what happened in the month before Carlesimo resuscitated the team.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just look at what happened in the month before Carlesimo resuscitated the team.
